column4: hi, I made a audio disk (with just one song on it) a few weeks ago, I unchecked the "Close after writing" thingey on the disk, and I want to add a audio file to it (mp3, but brasero converts that into "cd format"). How do i do that ? I only get options like "copy disk" etc
if you write the disk as you would a blank, I think brasero will find out it is a non closed disk and then change the burning accordingly
well, it doesn't. I say "new audio project", drag my music file into it, and i say "burn" and then it says I didn't insert any recordable disks
I am not sure where to go from here, unless it is in recent projects where you need to go. I don't know brasero well enough
